scripts.copyproduction: copyfiles package.json production && copyfiles .npmrc production && cd ./production && npm install --production && cd .. && copyfiles -u 1 "./production/node_modules/**/*" $Env:npm_package_config_servicename && Remove-Item -Force -Recurse ./production
scripts.copyfiles: copyfiles service.json configtemplate.json dist/* $Env:npm_package_config_servicename && npm run copyproduction
scripts.copyandzip: npm run copyfiles && npm run zip && Remove-Item -Recurse $Env:npm_package_config_servicename
